alert.note: Alert for Alger; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 11 at 9:04PM EST until February 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Moderate lake effect snow and considerable blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to locally 4 inches, greatest from Negaunee through Skandia to Trenary and Shingleton. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Alger and Marquette Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow will cause occasional whiteouts, especially along Highway M-28 and other roads exposed to the lakeshore. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
